title: Trait theories emphasize which of the following

content.question: In general, trait theories emphasize which of the following?

choices.label: The changing and temporary nature of human characteristics
The role of current environmental conditions in controlling behavior
The lasting nature of personal characteristics

content.answer: The lasting nature of personal characteristics

topic.text: 4.5: Social-Cognitive and Trait Theories of Personality

skill.text: 1.A: Apply psychological perspectives, theories, concepts, and research findings to a scenario.
